title: Kyle Sinckler: the new face of English rugby inspiring a generation
text:
Perry Blankson has never met Kyle Sinckler but the 21-year-old believes the England prop has helped shape his life. "I can see a lot of Kyle in myself," he says, and it doesn't take too long talking to him to work out why.

Sinckler may be 6,000 miles away in Tokyo but the legacy of his early years in southwest London are obvious to Blankson. Sinckler is only five years older than him but the prop's role as one of the founding players of Graveney School's first rugby team, under the guidance of teacher Stacia Long, has had a lasting impact. When they set up the team Long and Sinckler could surely not have imagined the teenager would go on to become one of the breakout stars of a World Cup; instead...
description: Perry Blankson has never met Kyle Sinckler but the 21-year-old believes the England prop has helped shape his life.
